ambiguities.source_text: make the solution dynamic so you can create a multiplication grid of any size
ambiguities.ref: result_dict[str(col)] = [num * col for num in numbers]

ambiguities.intent: Create one multiplier column for each integer k from 1 through grid_size (inclusive).

ambiguities.source_text: Create a parameter that allows the user to set the multiplication grid they want

ambiguities.intent: Generate one row per base Number from 1 through grid_size (inclusive).
